message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it offers tremendous value and would be a great purchase for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $8,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your budget constraints, but I can't let it go for less than $9,000. I'm confident this price reflects the true value of the product.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This price still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging its value.
